snippet: A son of President Mahmoud Abbas of the Palestinian Authority is among those younger people expressing support for the creation of a single state.
abstract: Growing cadre of prominent Palestinians are advocating creation of single state in which Jews and Arabs would be citizens with equal rights, over proposed two-state solution; group sees equal rights are more viable goal than independence; intergenerational debate has become common as children and grandchildren of those who founded Palestinian national movement increasingly question its goals and tactics.
lead_paragraph: A son of President Mahmoud Abbas of the Palestinian Authority is among those younger people expressing support for the creation of a single state.

headline.main: A Divide Among Palestinians on a Two-State Solution
headline.print_headline: Generations Divide on a Two-State Solution
